Really happy you are getting to write the comic Odin, does this detract any of your time away from your work on the champion's team

I am mostly assigned to CDev at this point (75%).   Which until recently was mostly writing a couple comic series.   I am still on champ team (25% ) but only working on one champ at this point— who doesnt ship till late next year.
Im also hoping to do some more VO directing on skins and champs — I didnt write.
Oh yeah can I also ask for your opinion on the doing things like an Annual for the Ashe comic like normal comics

I know in the past this hasn't really been a thing you guys could do other than the gangplank event, but given the marvel comic thing seems like a fairly big deal...

what do you guys think of giving ashe a new VO for release with the comic? I think it'd be cool to tie lore updates with in game updates beyond just full reworks. And it would be cool to see ashe's story reflected in her VO, could reference events from the comic etc.

What would that type of mancy be called?

Sort of like how a person who summons the undead is a necromancer.
Conjuration, I would imagine. He's a conjuring, conjuring demons.

Historically?

Evocation. One would summon or “evoke” their deity. Then come the Christianization of Europe this practice became tied to demons. 

However, D&D made evocation the school of making things explode for some reason, so I doubt people would recognize the word as anything other than that.
Well the study of demons is called demonology, so I guess the summoning of demons would be called demomancy?
That sounds badass, someone should make a demomancer.
It's just an idea but I really wish he would OwO
